sentences: The joint high-level segment of COP 13 and COP/MOP 3 took place from 11-12 December.

During the segment, four heads of state or government delivered statements, along with more than 100 ministers and other high-level government officials, senior representatives of intergovernmental and non-governmental organizations, UN bodies and specialized agencies, and a range of stakeholders.
Speakers reflected on a wide range of issues relating to climate change, the UNFCCC and the Kyoto Protocol.
